weap id [weapon]: 432 (Small Area Decay)
damage [dmg]: Decay
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1

(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5D5S to forge (D1S1)

The Doom Glaive is a truly fearsome weapon used by some undead warriors. Those close to where it strikes will be cursed for the rest of their lives. But those lives may be very short because the victims may age and die within minutes.
